card.name: Tanto
card.description: A wooden short sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Wooden Wakizashi
card.description: A wooden medium sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Wooden Katana
card.description: A wooden standard sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Curved Wooden Blade
card.description: A wooden sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tile below.

card.name: Wide Wooden Sword
card.description: A wooden sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below.

card.name: Wooden Naginata
card.description: A wooden spear that hits 2 tiles in front of you.

card.name: Wooden Kanobo
card.description: A studded mace that hits hard and stuns the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Wooden Tonfa
card.description: A wooden weapon that can attack and stun the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Wooden Bo Staff
card.description: A wooden staff that stuns 2 tiles in front of you.

card.name: Single Wooden Kunai
card.description: Throws a wooden kunai in front of you.

card.name: Double Wooden Kunai
card.description: Throws a wooden kunai in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Wooden Kunai
card.description: Throws a wooden kunai in all three rows.

card.name: Single Wooden Shuriken
card.description: Throws a wooden shuriken in front of you.

card.name: Double Wooden Shuriken
card.description: Throws a wooden shuriken in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Wooden Shuriken
card.description: Throws a wooden shuriken in all the rows.

card.name: Single Wooden Sai
card.description: Throws a wooden sai dagger in front of you.

card.name: Double Wooden Sai
card.description: Throws a wooden sai dagger in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Wooden Sai
card.description: Throws a wooden sai dagger in all the rows.

card.name: Wooden Naginata Throw
card.description: A wooden spear thrown at the tiles in front of you, piercing the first enemy and stopping at the second.

card.name: Single Bamboo Dart
card.description: Shoots a stun dart down the current row.

card.name: Double Bamboo Dart
card.description: Shoots a stun dart down the current row and row below.

card.name: Triple Bamboo Dart
card.description: Shoots a stun dart down all the rows.

card.name: Bamboo Sneak
card.description: A bamboo strike on the enemy's furthest panel.

card.name: Tree Growth
card.description: Grow a tree three spaces in front of you.
